list.assistance_dictionary: DQL - Product Management - Referenced Product Codes

comment.label_en: Registering other products as ''referenced products'' enables documents associated with those products to be included in searches for documents related to this product ($value(product_code)), and vice-versa. Use this feature to share documents with other products, where appropriate. You must be a designated Product Manager on both this product and the referenced products in order to do this.
